ingredients.item: 230g pack asparagus, cut into 3cm lengths (or 2cm, if thick)

instructions.step: Heat the butter in a large saucepan and cook the potatoes for 5 minutes until golden. Stir in the garlic and cook for 1 minute, before adding the vegetable stock and 1 litre water. Bring to the boil and simmer for 12-15 minutes, until the potatoes are tender.

Add the asparagus, bring back to the boil and cook for 1 minute more. Stir in the spinach leaves, cover and leave to wilt. Whizz half of the soup in a blender until smooth and then return to the pan. Season to taste then serve with some crusty bread.
